quote_last: . He closed the bedroom door and walked slowly downstairs. He opened the front door to see his car parked by the curb.
title: A Prisoner of Birth
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: . And what of Jonah? He and Harry would probably arrive about five minutes too late.
title: Berry and Co.
author: Dornford Yates

quote_first:
“The middle of the night?” Alec asked sharply. “Can you be more definite?”

quote_last: ” Daisy noted that he expressed no concern for her safety.
title: Dead in the Water
author: Carola Dunn
